content.prompt: Which of the following most immediately resulted from the Columbian Exchange?

choices.label: Expansion of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
Decline of Native American populations due to disease
Rise of mercantilism as an economic system

topic.text: 1.4: Columbian Exchange, Spanish Exploration, and Conquest

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
